trans-unit.source: Represents an expression editor instance.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma instância do editor de expressão.

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of an expression editor instance, see <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorService>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição detalhada de uma instância do editor de expressão, consulte <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorService>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorService>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the expression editor instance accepts the RETURN key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a instância do editor de expressão aceita a chave de retorno.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression editor accepts the RETURN key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o editor de expressão aceita a chave de retorno; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the expression editor instance accepts the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a instância do editor de expressão aceita a tecla de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression editor accepts the TAB key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o editor de expressão aceita a tecla de tabulação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can complete the string being typed by the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booleano que indica se a instância do editor de expressão pode concluir a cadeia que está a ser escrita pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.Boolean>definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can be closed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booleano que indica se a instância do editor de expressão pode ser fechada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression editor instance can be closed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a instância do editor de expressão pode ser fechada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the expression can be cut.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booleano que indica se a expressão pode ser cortar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression can be cut; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a expressão pode ser cortar; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the filter level can be decreased when using Intellisense filtering.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o nível de filtro pode ser diminuído, ao utilizar o Intellisense filtragem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the filter level can be decreased; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nível de filtro pode ser diminuído; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can retrieve global IntelliSense on the expression.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booleano que indica se a instância do editor de expressão pode obter o IntelliSense global na expressão.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.Boolean>definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the filter level can be increased when using Intellisense filtering.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o nível de filtro pode ser aumentado ao utilizar o Intellisense filtragem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the filter level can be increased; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nível de filtro pode ser aumentado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can retrieve parameter information on the expression.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booleano que indica se a instância do editor de expressão pode obter informações de parâmetro na expressão.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.Boolean>definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the expression can be pasted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booleano que indica se a expressão poderem ser colada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression can be pasted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a expressão poderem ser colada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can retrieve type information to be shown in an IntelliSense quick info tool tip.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booleano que indica se a instância do editor de expressão pode obter informações sobre o tipo para ser mostrada numa descrição IntelliSense informações rápida.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.Boolean>definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the system can redo the operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booleano que indica se o sistema pode efectuar novamente a operação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system can redo the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o sistema pode efectuar novamente a operação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the system can undo the operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booleano que indica se o sistema pode anular a operação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system can undo the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o sistema pode anular a operação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Clears the selection in the editor instance.
trans-unit.target: Anula a seleção na instância do editor.

trans-unit.source: Closes and purges the editor items.
trans-unit.target: Fecha e elimina os itens de editor.

trans-unit.source: This will close the specific expression editor instance.
trans-unit.target: Isto irá fechar a instância do editor de expressão específica.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the expression editor instance is closing.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a instância do editor de expressão está a fechar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the expression editor instance can provide a list of completions for the partial word typed by the user.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a instância do editor de expressão pode fornecer uma lista de conclusões para o word parcial escritas pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: For example, member, argument, and method names can be shown to the user in an attempt to help them complete the word they are typing.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, membro, argumento e os nomes de métodos podem ser apresentados ao utilizador numa tentativa para ajudá-los a concluir o word que escrever.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este método for bem sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the active expression.
trans-unit.target: Copia a expressão de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the copy is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a cópia for bem sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cuts the active expression.
trans-unit.target: Cuts a expressão de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cut is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o corte for bem sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Decreases the filter level to show all items in the Intellisense filter list and returns a value that indicates whether this operation was successful.
trans-unit.target: Diminui o nível de filtro para mostrar todos os itens na lista de filtros de Intellisense e devolve um valor que indica se esta operação foi concluída com êxito.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este método for bem sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets focus on the editor instance.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de focar-se na instância do editor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text used to generate an expression.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto utilizado para gerar uma expressão.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that contains the text used to generate an expression.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>que contém o texto utilizado para gerar uma expressão.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves global IntelliSense on the expression in the expression editor and returns a value that indicates whether this operation was successful.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o IntelliSense global na expressão no editor de expressão e devolve um valor que indica se esta operação foi concluída com êxito.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este método for bem sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the expression editor instance has aggregate focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a instância do editor de expressão tem foco agregado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the instance has aggregate focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a instância tem foco agregado.

trans-unit.source: The instance has aggregate focus when the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> or any other control created by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> has focus.
trans-unit.target: A instância tem agregado focar-se quando o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A>ou qualquer outro controlo criados pelo <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A>tem foco.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the editor instance has aggregate focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a instância de editor tem foco agregado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the horizontal scrollbar is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a barra de deslocamento horizontal está visível.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"></xref> instance that can be used to display in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"> </xref> instância pode ser utilizada para apresentar o <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Control"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Increases the filter level to show common items in the Intellisense filter list and returns a value that indicates whether this operation was successful.
trans-unit.target: Aumenta o nível de filtro para mostrar itens comuns na lista de filtros de Intellisense e devolve um valor que indica se esta operação foi concluída com êxito.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este método for bem sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Represents an event that is raised when the expression editor instance loses aggregate focus.
trans-unit.target: Representa um evento que é gerado quando a instância do editor de expressão perde o foco de agregação.

trans-unit.source: The instance loses aggregate focus when the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> and every control created by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> loose focus.
trans-unit.target: A instância perde agregado focar-se quando o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A>e cada controlo criados pelo <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A>perder o foco.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of lines of text to be displayed by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número máximo de linhas de texto a apresentar pelo <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This property implicitly sets the height of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref> control when growing to fit.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade define implicitamente a altura do <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""> </xref> controlar quando para se ajustar a crescer.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.MaxHeight%2A> is set, it will override `MaxLines`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.MaxHeight%2A>é definido, irá substituir `MaxLines`.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.MaxHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Int32> that containing the maximum number of lines of text to be displayed by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.Int32>esse que contém o número máximo de linhas de texto a apresentar pelo <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum number of lines of text to be displayed by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número mínimo de linhas de texto a apresentar pelo <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This property implicitly sets the height of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade define implicitamente a altura do <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.MinHeight%2A> is set, then it will override MinLines.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.MinHeight%2A>estiver definido, em seguida, irá substituir MinLines.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.MinHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns an<xref:System.Int32> that contains the minimum number of lines of text to be displayed by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um<xref:System.Int32> que contém o número mínimo de linhas de texto a apresentar pelo <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExpressionTextBox" name="ExpressionTextBox" href=""> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves parameter information on the expression in the expression editor and returns a value that indicates whether this operation was successful.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações de parâmetro de expressão no editor de expressão e devolve um valor que indica se esta operação foi concluída com êxito.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este método for bem sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Pastes the active expression.
trans-unit.target: Cola sobre a expressão de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the paste is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a colar for bem sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether type information to be shown in an IntelliSense quick info tool tip.
trans-unit.target: Determina se escrever as informações a apresentar na descrição IntelliSense informações rápida.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este método for bem sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reapplies the last operation that was undone in the editor, that is, reverse the effects of the undo operation.
trans-unit.target: Volta a última operação que foi anulada no editor de, ou seja, inverter os efeitos da operação de anulação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the redo is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a ação de Refazer for bem sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the text.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor do texto.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Represents an event that is raised when the text in an expression editor instance is changed.
trans-unit.target: Representa um evento que é gerado quando o texto numa instância editor expressão é alterado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Undoes the last operation in the editor.
trans-unit.target: Anular a última operação no editor.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the undo is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a anulação for bem sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the vertical scrollbar is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a barra de deslocamento vertical está visível.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>.
